metadata.title: CVE-2021-38496 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: During operations on MessageTasks, a task may have been removed while it was still scheduled, resulting in memory corruption and a potentially exploitable crash. This vulnerability affects Thunderbird < 78.15, Thunderbird < 91.2, Firefox ESR < 91.2, Firefox ESR < 78.15, and Firefox < 93.

notes.note: tyhicks> mozjs contains a copy of the SpiderMonkey JavaScript engine

criterions.comment: firefox package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '93.0+build1-0ubuntu0.21.04.1').
mozjs78 package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
thunderbird package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
